title: Blossomed
description: On Samhain, the veil between the spirit world and the material world thins. Anything can happen, including the rebirth of those souls who werenâ€™t given the chance to live to their full potential. One such soul had accepted her early death as her destiny. Fate has much more in store for her.Discover a sweet tale of new life, new love, and puppies! All proceeds from this novella for the month of April 2016 will go to benefit Autism Awareness. For ages 18 and up due to adult content.
author: R.L. Merrill
